title: Japan's ‘Dementia Money’ Crisis Puts Trillions of Dollars at Risk
description: Trillions of dollars in Japanese assets are held by people at risk of cognitive decline. On today’s Big Take Asia podcast, what this “dementia money cliff” means for the nation and the broader global economy.
